PASSWORD.INVALID_PASSWORD: Password must include uppercase, lowercase, number, special character, and be at least 8 characters long.
PASSWORD.INVALID_NEW_PASSWORD: New password must include uppercase, lowercase, number, special character, and be at least 8 characters long.
PASSWORD.SAME_PASSWORD: Your new password is the same as your old one; please choose a different password
PASSWORD.INVALID_OLD_PASSWORD: Old password must include uppercase, lowercase, number, special character, and be at least 8 characters long.
